titles.title: To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of Federal funds for certain agreements relating to the 46th G7 Summit, and for other purposes.
THUG Act

Trump's Heist Undermines the G7 Act
Trump’s Heist Undermines the G7 Act
THUG Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
